Text:
It's an excellent adaptation of the book with the same name. For those who are looking for the 1080p version, get it here:

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6423162

I saw this movie when I was about 19 years old  the first time (1989). It's still one of the movies that made the hardest impact on me to this day.
I strongly recommend it. 
It also has a wonderful soundtrack.
Thanks a lot BOZX.
